Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3978 affecting package vitess for versions less than 17.0.7-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-3978 affecting package vitess for versions less than 17.0.7-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package vitess is earlier than 17.0.7-1, affected by CVE-2023-3978
